Class EscapeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.InputStreamReader
        • ca.uwaterloo.softeng.advisor.EscapeReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

     class EscapeReader
extends java.io.InputStreamReader
    Remove carriage returns from input. They are confusing CSVReader. This is pretty much cut and paste from something user aioobe posted on StackOverflow on May 31, 2012 in response to question 10830366.
